PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-07602019-06-09,  ,  ,  ,  TC, 
ActAeronautics Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian Aviation Regulations (Medical Certificate – Validity Period)
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (MEDICAL CERTIFICATE – VALIDITY PERIOD) in order to narrow the discretion afforded to the Minister in determining whether to endorse a shorter validity period on a medical certificate.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0201 Publication Date: 2019-06-26
